name: Pipe & 3 legs
description:
Noghily found himself sitting around the hearth in a room. It is a very cramped space where most of the windows are filled with bleached letters.
After but a while he slowly starts to notice how his body is being locked into an expressive pipe.
Silence burdening his mind and when he is about to leave into the forest outside, there thinning in front of him is an unknown stranger. A woman she is who starts talking around the convex corner...  • This build was finished in order to participate in the #neveralonejam (Theme: Into The Forest.) and right now it is classically imperfect. So be prepared to find some bugs. It’s worth considering that if you donate to this submission on itch.io you are also helping  KROTRUVINK development. Such a support simply cannot be overstated. • Этот билд был завершён в порядке участия в #neveralonejam (Тема: В Леса.) и на данный момент классически несовершенен. Так что будьте готовы обнаружить пару ошибок.
Стоит упомянуть, что делая пожертвования для этой заявки на itch.io, вы также помогаете разработке KROTRUVINK. Такая поддержка элементарно не может быть переоценена. • As a tribute to variety this game’s build is filled with a spectre of choice between Russian and English languages.  • В качестве дани вариативности эта игровая сборка наполнена призрачным выбором между Русским и Английским языками. File list (UPDATED:prototype ver. 1.0.1): • Engine  • Pipe_and_3_legs  • Manifest_NonUFSFiles_Win64  • Pipe_and_3_legs.exe
